summary: The BuildRequest contains no stated requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff modifies the owner login page and updates project summary/state files, which are changes not requested by any documented requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Owner login flow changes: added admin pre-check via `actor.isCallerAdmin()`, passcode authentication via `actor.authenticateAsOwner(passcode)`, UI/validation/error handling updates, and navigation/toast behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so this functionality is not traceable to any requested change.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/generated frontend file summaries describing various app features and route/provider setup.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided; this documentation-like update is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project state metadata indicating a known issue about shop owner login regression/bug and marking `isFixRequest: true`.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided that requested changes to project metadata/state tracking.
